question: My Pennie application says that I have been assessed as potentially eligible for Medicaid, but I need to submit additional docs. I also received a notice from the DHS that says I need to submit additional docs. Where do I submit these documents?
text:
My Pennie application says that I have been assessed as potentially eligible for Medicaid, but I need to submit additional docs. I also received a notice from the DHS that says I need to submit additional docs. Where do I submit these documents? 
          
        
Individuals who applied for healthcare through Pennie and had their application transferred to the Department of Human Services for a Medicaid (called Medical Assistance in PA) eligibility determination can submit additional documentation via the COMPASS website, COMPASS mobile app, mail, or by dropping it off in person at the local County Assistance Office.
